panels.description: Number of time CDC Publisher service is restarted in the given time span.
panels.title: Publisher Service Restarts

panels.description: Number of times Coordinator component loop was run.
panels.title: Coordinator Restarts

panels.description: Number of times Publisher component loop was run.
panels.title: Publisher Restarts

panels.description: Number of times Live Stream component loop was run.
panels.title: Live Scanner Restarts

panels.description: Number of times Secondary Scanner component loop was run.
panels.title: Secondary Scanner Restarts

panels.description: Number of times Delete Scanner component loop was run.
panels.title: Delete Scanner Restarts

panels.description: End to End latencies of live events published via CDC Publisher
panels.title: Live Events E2E Latencies

panels.description: End to End latencies of backfill events published via CDC Publisher
panels.title: Backfill Events E2E Latencies

panels.description: End to End latencies of backfill events published via CDC Publisher
panels.title: Heartbeat Events E2E Latencies

panels.description: Status that live streams were at any given time (0 means that there were no status changes in that time duration)
panels.title: Live stream statuses

panels.description: Time Continuity Enforcer first tries to complete any abruptly stopped work assignments from any previous run. This is an indicator of repeated work to be done, before we can move on to recent work assignments.
panels.title: TCE Existing Work completion

panels.description: Comparison between live stream and backfill events (indicates how much repeated work the system has to do)
panels.title: Events Published (Live v/s Backfill)

panels.description: This panel gives a comparison between the total timespan over which holes in the timeline are spread, v/s how much of them are we able to fill (both are gauge metrics). A continuous spread between the two indicates that we are not able to fill the holes
panels.title: Timeline hole filling

panels.description: Number of events scanned by live stream scanner
panels.title: Events Scanned (Live Stream Scanner)

panels.description: Number of tasks that Scanners are committing to the database
panels.title: Scanner timeline task commits

panels.description: This panel tracks the failure counts, while committing tasks to the timeline (database)
panels.title: Timeline commit failures

panels.description: Size of the TCE graph, and time taken to complete its various stages.
panels.title: TCE Task Graph

panels.description: Number of fetch related API calls in the selected interval, and the count of their respective EOS messages.
panels.title: Fetch (Full/Incremental) API Calls & EOS

panels.description: Time spent by replay streams in each state (waiting, active, finishing)
panels.title: Replay Stream State Durations

panels.description: Delete events that were generated, and those that were committed to SQLite database (and failures)
panels.title: Delete Events (Scanned -> SQLite)

panels.description: Number of replay and delete events generated
panels.title: Replay & Delete Events Generated

panels.description: Number of replay and delete events published to DGA
panels.title: Replay & Delete Events Published

panels.description: Number of retried and reassigned replay works.
panels.title: Replay works (Retry/Reassign/Empty)

panels.description: E2E latencies of replay works (& delete works)
panels.title: Replay/Delete Work E2E Latencies
Replay upsert events generated and dropped

panels.description: Time taken by replay works in various stages of their lifecycle
panels.title: Replay Work Lifecycle durations (wait/queued/processing)

panels.description: Time taken by delete works in various stages of their lifecycle
panels.title: Delete Work Lifecycle durations (wait/queued/processing)

panels.description: Number of replay events lost, and full/incremental events published
panels.title: Replay work events lost and published

panels.description: Time spent by Replay works in each of their lifecycle status
panels.title: Replay work status durations

list.description: Data source to be used for metrics
list.label: Datasource
list.name: Datasource
